StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetWaiverTypesForCategory]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@WaiverCategoryID int)
AS
SELECT DISTINCT wt.WAIVER_TYPE_ID AS ID, wt.WAIVER_TYPE_CODE + ' - ' + wt.WAIVER_TYPE_DESC AS Descrip.on, wt.WAIVER_TYPE_CODE AS Code, wt.IsAc.ve FROM WAIVER w WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN WAIVER_TYPE wt ON w.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID = @WaiverCategoryID AND wt.WAIVER_TYPE_ID = w.WAIVER_TYPE_ID AND wt.WAIVER_TYPE_CODE <> '0'
